gw.servlet

Class ServletUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.servlet.ServletUtils

  • public class ServletUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for use with gosu servlets

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthenticatedUser

        public static User getAuthenticatedUser(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                        boolean touch)
        This will get the currently logged on user if the servlet shares the application context. It will return null, if the contexts are different; the session is null (the session id was not maintained on the client or the client has expired the session); a Guidewire user is not logged in or exited the app; the user did not supply the correct password; the ServiceToken timeout has expired.

        This will update both the session timeout and the service token timeout, if touch is requested. Otherwise, the UI session request/response solely determine timeout.

        It only makes sense to call this upon entry into the service or doGet method, before other attempts to login have occurred.

        Parameters:
        req - the http request from the service or get method
        touch - whether to update the timestamp on the service token
        Returns:
        the user only if defined and session still valid

      • getBasicAuthenticatedUser

        public static User getBasicAuthenticatedUser(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
                                      throws LoginException
        This will get the username and password from basic authentication and attempt to login (see below). It will throw an exception if basic authentication is present but is invalid. It will return null if no basic authentication.
        Parameters:
        req - the http request from the service or get method
        Returns:
        the User or null if no basic authentication headers
        Throws:
        LoginException - if there are problems login

      • login

        public static User login(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                         java.lang.String userName,
                         java.lang.String password)
                  throws LoginException
        This method is called as part of getBasicAuthenticatedUser, it is broken out so that if you have other means of getting a username password, this can be called directly. Given a user name and password it will login the user and create a session. It will throw an exception if login information is provided but is incorrect.
        Parameters:
        req - the request to create the session in
        userName - the user name
        password - the password
        Returns:
        the User if authenticated or null if not valid
        Throws:
        LoginException - if there were issues with the login

      • login

        public static User login(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
                  throws LoginException
        This method will attempt to authenticate a user and log them in using HttpServletRequest as a source of authentication data. It will throw an exception if login information is provided but is incorrect.
        Parameters:
        req - the request to create the session in
        Returns:
        the User if authenticated or null if not valid
        Throws:
        LoginException - if there were issues with the login
